name: babelrc-v8
description: A collection of babelrcs for the v8 versions that ship with node.

scripts.version: echo 'Do your builds for this version (exit when done, node verify.js to see if you are done)' && bash && node verify.js && git add babelrcs

author: Rebecca Turner <me@re-becca.org> (http://re-becca.org/)
